content.query:
-- =============================================================================
-- OpenHack MDWH
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

-- Check out the distinct values
-- SELECT DISTINCT [ActorGender] FROM [ext].[Catalog]
-- SELECT DISTINCT [ActorName], COUNT(DISTINCT ISNULL(ActorGender,1)) AS 'GenderCount' FROM [ext].[Catalog] GROUP BY ActorName ORDER BY ActorName

-- Load table
DECLARE @MaxSK INTEGER;
SELECT @MaxSK = ISNULL(MAX(ActorSK), 0) FROM [dbo].[DimActors]

INSERT INTO [dbo].[DimActors] (
	ActorSK
  , ActorID
  , ActorName
  , ActorGender
)
SELECT * FROM (
	SELECT
		@MaxSK + ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ExternalTable.ActorName) AS ActorSK
      , ExternalTable.ActorID AS ActorID
      , ExternalTable.ActorName AS ActorName
      , ExternalTable.ActorGender AS ActorGender
	FROM (	
		SELECT
		    [ActorID]
		  , [ActorName]
		  , ISNULL(MAX([ActorGender]), 'NA') AS ActorGender
		FROM
			[ext].[Catalog]
		GROUP BY
			[ActorID]
		  , [ActorName]
	  ) ExternalTable
) CleansedTable
WHERE CleansedTable.ActorID NOT IN (SELECT [ActorID] FROM [dbo].[DimActors])

-- Check Load
-- SELECT * FROM [dbo].[DimActors]
